file: tmp_„Äê3D LIVE CONCERT ÁîüË™ï„É©„Ç§„Éñ„ÄëFUWAMOCO birthday party night üéÇüêæ „Äê#FWMCbday25„Äë [ouQF2A1l_cI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: MC section where FUWAMOCO introduce their birthday merchandise items, including body pillow covers, plushie keychains, hairbands, badges, and voice packs.
FUWAMOCO transition to the final song of their birthday concert.

subtitles.original: „Ç§„Ç≥„É¢„ÉÅÔºÅ„Ç§„Ç≥„É¢„ÉÅÔºÅ„ÅÇ„Çä„Åå„Å®„ÅÜÔºÅThank you!
subtitles.english: Ikomochi! Ikomochi! Arigato! Thank you!

subtitles.original: Wow! This is the Fuwawa dakimakura.
subtitles.english: Wow! This is the Fuwawa dakimakura.

subtitles.original: And here is the Mococo dakimakura. Bau bau!
subtitles.english: And here is the Mococo dakimakura. Bau bau!

subtitles.original: They're very big. Mococo-chan, Mococo-chan...
subtitles.english: They're very big. Mococo-chan, Mococo-chan...

subtitles.original: Fuwawa-chan! Bau bau!
subtitles.english: Fuwawa-chan! Bau bau!

subtitles.original: They're for hugging.
subtitles.english: They're for hugging.

subtitles.original: They're for hugging. Yes.
subtitles.english: They're for hugging. Yes.

subtitles.original: But you know, even though they might be a little bit embarrassing...
subtitles.english: But you know, even though they might be a little bit embarrassing...

subtitles.original: We hope that they can help you sleep soundly at night, you know?
subtitles.english: We hope that they can help you sleep soundly at night, you know?

subtitles.original: Bau bau! Bau bau!
subtitles.english: Bau bau! Bau bau!

subtitles.original: And next, we have Fuwamoco keychain plushies!
subtitles.english: And next, we have Fuwamoco keychain plushies!

subtitles.original: Look how compact they are! Compact!
subtitles.english: Look how compact they are! Compact!

subtitles.original: But now, Fuwamoco can go anywhere and everywhere along with you.
subtitles.english: But now, Fuwamoco can go anywhere and everywhere along with you.

subtitles.original: Attached to your bag, maybe your keys, maybe even in your car.
subtitles.english: Attached to your bag, maybe your keys, maybe even in your car.

subtitles.original: No matter what, we'll be by your side. It's super cute!
subtitles.english: No matter what, we'll be by your side. It's super cute!

subtitles.original: And next, we have a very cute Fuwawa hairband and Mococo hairband.
subtitles.english: And next, we have a very cute Fuwawa hairband and Mococo hairband.

subtitles.original: Maybe you're wondering, what exactly is this?
subtitles.english: Maybe you're wondering, what exactly is this?

subtitles.original: Well, this way we can help keep back the fluff from your face when you wash your face at night.
subtitles.english: Well, this way we can help keep back the fluff from your face when you wash your face at night.

subtitles.original: Or maybe you can just have fun with a quick Fuwamoco style disguise!
subtitles.english: Or maybe you can just have fun with a quick Fuwamoco style disguise!

subtitles.original: It's up to you!
subtitles.english: It's up to you!

subtitles.original: And finally, we have some cute collectible button badges of dakimakura Fuwamoco.
subtitles.english: And finally, we have some cute collectible button badges of dakimakura Fuwamoco.

subtitles.original: They're sparkly and holographic, and come in a super cute heart shape.
subtitles.english: They're sparkly and holographic, and come in a super cute heart shape.

subtitles.original: It's perfect for any ita-bag, you know? Just bringing a bit more Fuwamoco to your belongings.
subtitles.english: It's perfect for any ita-bag, you know? Just bringing a bit more Fuwamoco to your belongings.

subtitles.original: But we also have something special as well, right Mococo-chan?
subtitles.english: But we also have something special as well, right Mococo-chan?

subtitles.original: You know, what would help you get an even better rest at night, right?
subtitles.english: You know, what would help you get an even better rest at night, right?

subtitles.original: Maybe a soothing sleepover ASMR voice from us? There's a Fuwawa voice...
subtitles.english: Maybe a soothing sleepover ASMR voice from us? There's a Fuwawa voice...

subtitles.original: ...and a Mococo voice. But we hope that you'll listen to both of them right before bed.
subtitles.english: ...and a Mococo voice. But we hope that you'll listen to both of them right before bed.

subtitles.original: And finally, for those who purchase the entire set, we also have a special thank you bonus voice message as well.
subtitles.english: And finally, for those who purchase the entire set, we also have a special thank you bonus voice message as well.

subtitles.original: And of course, there are also special hand-signed limited edition sets that come with a polaroid style card.
subtitles.english: And of course, there are also special hand-signed limited edition sets that come with a polaroid style card.

subtitles.original: So cute! We really hope that you'll be able to get your paws on them as well, Ruffians!
subtitles.english: So cute! We really hope that you'll be able to get your paws on them as well, Ruffians!

subtitles.original: And as a full set bonus, you'll receive one card that can be used in the Hololive Official Card Game!
subtitles.english: And as a full set bonus, you'll receive one card that can be used in the Hololive Official Card Game!

subtitles.original: Yeah, one card for Fuwawa's set, one card for Mococo's set. And this card is only available to those who purchase from the Hololive Production Official Shop.
subtitles.english: Yeah, one card for Fuwawa's set, one card for Mococo's set. And this card is only available to those who purchase from the Hololive Production Official Shop.

subtitles.original: Okay, got it! Please look forward to it, okay? Bau bau!
subtitles.english: Okay, got it! Please look forward to it, okay? Bau bau!

subtitles.original: You know, after that very exciting announcement...
subtitles.english: You know, after that very exciting announcement...

subtitles.original: ...we still have one last song we'd like to sing for you today.
subtitles.english: ...we still have one last song we'd like to sing for you today.

subtitles.original: Well, this next song is one that's really important to us, especially when we were still locked up back in the cell.
subtitles.english: Well, this next song is one that's really important to us, especially when we were still locked up back in the cell.

subtitles.original: And now that we're finally a part of Hololive, and you know, we're even able to have our first ever birthday live...
subtitles.english: And now that we're finally a part of Hololive, and you know, we're even able to have our first ever birthday live...

subtitles.original: ...we'd like to sing it for you. Okay? Please listen, Kirameki Rider!
subtitles.english: ...we'd like to sing it for you. Okay? Please listen, Kirameki Rider!
